title: USA TODAY Sports Releases Olympics Coverage Exclusive to Google Assistant Devices
text:
CLOSE

USA TODAY Sports (Photo: USA TODAY Sports)

For the 2018 Winter Olympics, USA TODAY Sports will produce content exclusively for Google Assistant on devices like Google Home and phones.

USA TODAY Sports will provide updates daily at 3:00 PM ET , covering the latest news and highlights from the games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.

This feature will also let you know when you need to tune in ahead of time by announcing when the biggest names in the Games will be competing live. From triumphs and medal counts to winners and near podium misses, USA TODAY Sports and Google Assistant will be there to cover it all.

To access this feature on your Google Home, just say:

“Ok Google, play the latest news from USA TODAY Olympics,” or, “Ok Google, play USA TODAY Olympics.”

Enjoy this year’s Winter Olympics games!
